Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.api

Interface CommunicationApplication

All Superinterfaces:
Application, EventProcessor
All Known Implementing Classes:
CamSendingApp, MessageReceivingApp, TrafficLightApp, UserTaggedValueReadingApp, WeatherServerApp, WeatherWarningApp, WeatherWarningAppCell
public interface CommunicationApplication extends Application
All applications that implement some form of V2x communication are to implement this interface.

  • Method Details

    • onMessageReceived

      void onMessageReceived(ReceivedV2xMessage receivedV2xMessage)
      Receive a V2X Message.
      Parameters:
      receivedV2xMessage - the received message container.

    • onAcknowledgementReceived

      void onAcknowledgementReceived(ReceivedAcknowledgement acknowledgement)
      Receive an acknowledgement from a previously sent V2X Message.
      Parameters:
      acknowledgement - the acknowledgement object which contains the sent V2X Message and the acknowledgement status.

    • onCamBuilding

      void onCamBuilding(CamBuilder camBuilder)
      This method is called when a CAM is build by different Simulation Units that support CAM connectivity.
      Parameters:
      camBuilder - the builder for the CAM

    • onMessageTransmitted

      void onMessageTransmitted(V2xMessageTransmission v2xMessageTransmission)
      This method is called when a V2X message is transmitted.
      Parameters:
      v2xMessageTransmission - the container for the V2XMessage to be transmitted
